task.shortdesc: System administrators can set the admin superuser password by using .

context.p: The admin superuser password is encrypted and stored locally to ensure that the server can be administered even if the configured external LDAP server cannot be reached, or if the external LDAP server configuration is incorrect.
You can set the admin superuser password by using a , or by using the . For more information about using the to set the admin superuser password, see .
